Nectar Bar

A Lively Oasis of Flavors and Elegance

Welcome to Nectar — the heart of Iris Hotel Boston, where sophistication meets comfort
Our bar offers
a wide variety of drinks to satisfy even the most discerning guests
Start your morning
with a perfectly brewed coffee or enjoy a fragrant tea at any time of the day
In the evening
unwind in our relaxed atmosphere with exclusive cocktails and a carefully curated wine selection

At Nectar

everyone will find something to their taste, whether it’s warm conversations over a cup of espresso or unforgettable evenings with friends enjoying a signature cocktail.
